tables.attribute_catalog:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_attribute_catalog` (
  `catalog_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `catalog_code` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `catalog_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `content_id` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`catalog_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.attribute_field:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_attribute_field` (
  `field_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `field_code` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `content_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `field_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `plugin_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `params_text` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`field_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.attribute_field_map:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_attribute_field_map` (
  `map_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `section_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `field_id` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `sort_order` smallint(11) DEFAULT '1',
  `ext_params_text` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`map_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `section_id` (`section_id`,`field_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.attribute_option:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_attribute_option` (
  `option_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `field_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `option_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`option_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.attribute_plugin:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_attribute_plugin` (
  `plugin_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `plugin_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `is_predefined` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_form_control` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `plugin_setting` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `is_multiple` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
  `module_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  PRIMARY KEY (`plugin_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.attribute_section:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_attribute_section` (
  `section_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `content_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `section_code` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `section_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`section_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.attribute_section_map:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_attribute_section_map` (
  `map_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `catalog_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `section_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `sort_order` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  PRIMARY KEY (`map_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `template_id` (`catalog_id`,`section_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
